questionnaire_json.questionaire_title: 2016 County Planning Incentive Grant Annual Application
questionnaire_json.questionaire_introduction:
For information regarding the Planning Incentive Grant Program please reference the following statutes and regulations:
Agriculture Retention and Development Act-N.J.S.A 4:1C-11, et seq
Planning Incentive Grant Statute- N.J.S.A 4:1C-43.1
Farmland Preservation Program Regulations- N.J.A.C. 2:76-17

questions.question_text: Is the county requesting SADC certification of an agricultural development area amendment as part of this application approval?
questions.question_help_text:
If YES, please attach the following:
A copy of the adopted criteria for agricultural development area identification
A copy of the CADB resolution of agricultural development area adoption
Justification that the adopted agricultural development area meets the statutory criteria set forth at N.J.A.C. 2:76-1.3
For each project area please attach a completed Project Area Summary Form.

columns.name: Total Estimated Cost For Targeted Farm Easement Purchase

questions.question_text: What are your preservation goals?

question_sections.question_section_help: A NO answer is acknowledgement that the county relies upon SADC policy or regulation. The word "policy" is intended broadly to include formal and informal policies, guidelines and rules established by the county.

questions.question_text: Does the county have a minimum eligibility criteria or standards policy for solicitation and approval of applications for farmland preservation?

dependent_questions.question_text: If Yes, has the policy been amended since last year's submittal?

questions.question_text: Does the county have a ranking criteria policy to prioritize farms for preservation funding?
questions.question_help_text: See SADC regulation N.J.A.C. 2:76-6.16 & SADC Policy P-14E

dependent_questions.question_text: If Yes, has the policy been amended since last year's submittal?

questions.question_text: Does the county have a policy on agricultural labor housing for preserved farms?

dependent_questions.question_text: If Yes, has the policy been amended since last year's submittal?

questions.question_text: Does the county have a policy for replacement of a residence on preserved farmland?

dependent_questions.question_text: If Yes, has the policy been amended since last year's submittal?

questions.question_text: Does the county have a policy for the allocation of Residual Dwelling Site Opportunities?
questions.question_help_text: See SADC regulation N.J.A.C. 2:76-6.17 and Policy P-28

dependent_questions.question_text: If Yes, has the policy been amended since last year's submittal?

questions.question_heading: Exercising a Residual Dwelling Site Opportunity:
questions.question_text: Does the county have a policy for exercising Residual Dwelling Site Opportunities?
questions.question_help_text: See SADC regulation N.J.A.C.2:76-6.17 and Policy P-31

dependent_questions.question_text: If Yes, has the policy been amended since last year's submittal?

questions.question_text: Does the county have a policy regarding the division of permanently preserved farmland?

dependent_questions.question_text: If Yes, has the policy been amended since last year's submittal?

questions.question_text: Does the county have a policy for the granting of severable and non-severable exceptions?

dependent_questions.question_text: If Yes, has the policy been amended since last year's submittal?

questions.question_text: Does the county have other policies related to farmland preservation?

dependent_questions.question_text: If Yes, please list and describe:

questions.question_text: County dedicated open space/farmland preservation tax:

dependent_questions.question_text: How much was the dedicated open space/ farmland preservation tax?
How much annual revenue was generated from the dedicated tax?
How much annual tax revenue is dedicated to farmland preservation?

questions.question_text: Does the county have repeated annual appropriations dedicated to farmland preservation?
Does the county have repeated issuance of bonded indebtedness?
Does the county have any other funding resources?
Total annual revenue dedicated to farmland preservation by the county?

columns.name: Total Annual Revenue for Farmland Preservation

questions.question_text: Does the county require cost share contribution from sources other than the state on development easement acquisitions?
questions.question_help_text: If YES, please attach a copy of the adopted CADB or Freeholder Board policy or resolution explaining the cost share requirements of the County. If no policy has yet been adopted please attach a description of the county’s current position with respect to cost share obligations.

questions.question_text: Does the county permit the use of installment purchase agreements?
questions.question_help_text: If the answer is YES, please attach a copy of the adopted CADB policy or resolution explaining the county installment purchase program. If no policy has yet been adopted please attach a description of the program.

questions.question_text: Does the county currently use installment purchase agreements?
questions.question_help_text: If the answer is YES, please attach a copy of the adopted CADB policy or resolution explaining the county installment purchase program. If no policy has yet been adopted please attach a description of the program.

questions.question_text: Installment Purchase Agreements are: (Check all that apply)
input: Required on a case by case basis

questions.question_heading: Cost Projections Associated with One, Five and Ten Year Goals:
questions.question_help_text: These are associated with previously entered preservation goals

questions.question_heading: Estimate of Easement Purchase Cost on All Targeted Farms:

columns.name: Total Estimated Funding from Other Sources
Total Estimated Cost for Targeted Farm Easement Purchase
Total Estimated Funding from Other Sources

questions.question_text: How was the cost of purchasing development easements on the targeted farms determined?
input: Appraisal of the entire project area
